content: no button no sew towel holder designed by chateau bornais crochet materials 5 mm hook bernat handicrafter cotton less than 1 skein note chain 2 at the beginning of each row counts as first double_crochet picot slip_stitch in next st chain 3 slip_stitch in first chain of chain 3 pattern body chain 11 row 1 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and in each chain across turn 10 double_crochet row 2 10 chain 2 double_crochet in next 9 st turn 10 double_crochet outer edge chain 15 slip_stitch in last double_crochet then turning work sideways 2sc in ends of each row 20 single_crochet chain 15 skip 9 st on end and slip_stitch in last stitch then turning work sideways 2sc in ends of each row 20 single_crochet now you will be at the first chain 15 loop work 20 single_crochet in loop then working in side picot slip_stitch 10x 10 picots and 10 slip_stitch work 20 single_crochet in next chain 15 loop then working in 2nd side picot slip_stitch 10x 10 picots and 10 slip_stitch finish off weave in ends
